name: SLAUGHTER☆SQUAD
description:
YOU HAVE A HUNGER

A HUNGER THAT YOU’VE BEEN NEGLECTING
For the most part, you’re a pretty normal mid-20-something year old who lives in a shitty apartment in the city. Well, except for one thing.

Your.....”Associate” Carter “Dollface” Abernathy.

Who is a murderer, and quite frankly, a sloppy one at that. And you’re the accessory to his crimes.
No matter what way you’ve gotten to know the man,or how you feel about him, you’re stuck with him, and stuck with just being his little “helper”

........Or are you? Especially when you’re suddenly given a....Unique opportunity.
 
WELCOME TO THE
SLAUGHTER☆SQUAD
